about_the_game:
You will have to survive the cold New Year's Eve, look for food in the trash in the world where no one cares about you. This is an adventure where you have to survive Christmas, a holiday that has never been so cold before...

Completely recreated from scratch

Beneath the Cardboard: Be Happy — a project that turned into a full-fledged remake. The game takes the idea and atmosphere of Beneath the Cardboard, but remains original. All the 3D models, soundtrack, code and design of the game were made manually from scratch.

Try to find a happiness in the flow of melancholy

Plunge into an atmosphere of hopelessness, harsh survival instead of a normal life. The wind is getting colder, the night is getting darker and passers-by do not become more empathic, and the only one who can help you is yourself. New melancholic and dreary soundtrack in ambient genre will help you get into the game world.

Look for leftovers in the trash, burn boxes to keep warm, and be careful at night.

Be careful at the night

When going on night wanderings, look around. You never know what terrors in the night can await you on the street, right?

highlighted.name: Hard in training, hard in battle
What do you need from me?
Our path is not over yet
Dark forces are viciously oppressing us
But my hope will never die
